Xavier Dolan: à l'impossible je suis tenu
programme.desc: Xavier Dolan on oma filmidega võitnud publiku ja filmifestivalide žüriide südamed. Koostööst Kanada režissööriga räägivad näitlejad Anne Dorval, Vincent Cassel, Melvil Poupaud ja paljud teised. Nathalie Baye kiidab, et Dolan on oma noore ea kohta üllatavalt kogenud, Thierry Frémaux peab teda jultunuks, aga kõik on nõus sellega, et Xavier Dolan on kirglik, loov ja alati kuhugi ruttav perfektsionist.

programme.title: Keha: sisemiste sotsiaalvõrgustike imed
The Body, Miracles of the Inner Social Networks
programme.desc: Aju on peetud alati kogu organismi kontrollkeskuseks, kuid hiljutised teadusuuringud näitavad, et kõik elundid on omavahel sotsiaalvõrgustikuna suhtluses. Nad saadavad sõnumeid, hoiatusi, reageerivad ja teevad omavahel ka aju vahenduseta koostööd. Film viib üllatavale retkele uurima sisemise mikrokosmose salajast suhtlust.

programme.title: MI
programme.desc: NOËP-i muusika on eriline, kuna erutab nii pop- kui ka elektronmuusika kuulajaid. Millisest algest muusika sünnib, milline on inimene saladusliku tähekombinatsiooni taga? Kohtume muusikalooja Andres Kõpperiga enne tema suurt kontserti. Autor Timo Steiner, režissöör Ülle Õun, toimetaja Joonas Hellerma, produtsent Silja Kala.

programme.title: Kurjategijad
programme.desc: Gabby üritab hakkama saada oma maaomanikust isaga, John aga tahab enda isa teadmata räpase rahaga oma ettevõtet päästa. Christiani leidmiseks korraldatakse hulljulge sissemurdmine ja selle käigus selgub midagi hoopis ootamatut ühe kurjategija kohta.

programme.title: Kurjategijad
programme.desc: Arvates, et nad on pääsenud, lasevad kurjategijad hetkeks valvsusel langeda ja see maksab neile kurjasti kätte. Nüüd seisavad nad valiku ees: kas hukkuda omaette hoides või püüda üheskoos olukorrast eluga välja tulla.

programme.title: Teel jalgpalli MM-ile
programme.desc: Saatesari tutvustab Kataris toimuvate maailmameistrivõistlustele jõudnud 32 finalisti.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: PÖFF toob rahvusvahelise filmiloomingu taas Eestisse, ent samas teeb kino maailmas läbi suuri muutusi. Kas filmikunst võib veel teha ajalugu? "Plekktrummi" külaline on Pimedate Ööde Filmifestivali juht Tiina Lokk. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma, toimetaja Hedi Rosma, režissöör Maire Radsin, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool
programme.desc: "PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool" aitab orienteeruda Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali rikkalikus ja mitmetahulises kavas. Intervjuud režissööride ja asjaosalistega heidavad lisaks festivalile ka laiema kõrvalpilgu filmimaastikul toimuvale, oma sõna ütlevad sekka ka filmispetsialistid ning -kriitikud. Toimetajad Kaspar Viilup ja Kaisa Potisepp, režissöör Jan Jonatan Karits, produtsent Age Kraus.

programme.title: Lehmaelu
Cow
programme.desc: Eksperimentaalne Briti dokumentaalfilm jälgib nelja aasta jooksul ühe täiesti tavalise lüpsilehma Luna igapäevaelu ja -toimetusi. Tulemuseks on ilustamata pilguheit kariloomade monotoonsesse ja trööstitusse maailma, mis tekitab ebamugavaid küsimusi selle kohta, kuidas loomsed toiduained meie söögilauale jõuavad ning kas meie vajaduste rahuldamine õigustab teistele elusolenditele kannatuste põhjustamist.

programme.title: MI
programme.desc: NOËP-i muusika on eriline, kuna erutab nii pop- kui ka elektronmuusikakuulajaid. Millisest algest muusika sünnib, milline on inimene saladusliku tähekombinatsiooni taga? Kohtume muusikalooja Andres Kõpperiga enne tema suurt kontserti sümfooniaorkestriga. Autor Timo Steiner, režissöör Ülle Õun, toimetaja Joonas Hellerma, produtsent Silja Kala.

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Kilpkonnadel on pulmad tulekul, aga peigmees satub täbarasse olukorda. Džungliässad tõttavad appi!

programme.title: Rebased ja mägrad
programme.desc: Skautmäger läheb Roosi ja Roosi isa Pärdiga jalutama ning saab Pärdi kohta nii mõndagi huvitavat teada.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Täna esitavad Mikk-Mikk, Tork ja Tatik üksteisele väljakutseid.

programme.title: Indiaanipoiss Yakari
programme.desc: Yakari läheb Tossutajale metsast ravimtaimi tooma, kuid avastab teel, et kõik loomad käituvad kuidagi veidralt.

programme.title: Vahvad jänkud
programme.desc: Vahvad jänkud tähistavad koos sõpradega uue aasta saabumist.

programme.title: Lastetuba
programme.desc: Jou-jou, lapsed! What's up, Timmu? Mis tiksud siin? Niisuguse tervitusega ehmatab Markus Timmu täiesti ära. Stsenarist Gert Kiiler, mängivad Mart Kampus ja Oskar Seeman.

programme.title: Rantšo
programme.desc: Angelo peab veisekarja teise linna toimetama. Sõbrad lähevad temaga kaasa. Muidugi ei toimu rännak ilma viperusteta. Kas sõpradel õnnestub kari raskustest hoolimata kohale toimetada?

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: NOVA topib oma nina sinna, kus on põnevust, uut ja vajalikku, head muusikat ja ägedaid nippe! Kõigele, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Sarja toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Anna Pihl.

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Inimest tulistati ja Penhale peab süüdlase välja selgitama. Louisa tunneb end pigem Martini patsiendi kui abikaasana ja teeb ettepaneku minna viljakusspetsialisti juurde. Jamesile saab osaks krahh ja pubi pannakse müüki.

programme.title: Rännud ehtsate maitsete maal
programme.desc: Pablo on lõpetanud oma rännaku Indias, on aeg kokkuvõtete tegemiseks. Pablo meenutab reisil kogetud põnevamaid maitseid.

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Aafrika Dogonite suguharu elab Malis Nigeri jõest lõunas. Nende oluliseks rituaaliks on dama, mis on seotud esivanemate vaimude austamisega ja surnute ärasaatmisega teise ilma. Seda püha rituaali korraldatakse vaid korra 12 aasta järel. Saame ainsate valgetena sellest suurejoonelisest maskišõust osa. Aafrika kultuuriga käisid tutvumas Tiina Jokinen ja Peeter Vähi.

programme.title: Lahutus Eesti moodi
programme.desc: Tauno ja Aksel peavad koos jahile minema ning Tauno võtab kogemata koos kaartidega kaasa ka Mirjami ülestunnistuse, kus on kirjas, et Aksel on talle lapse teinud. Aksel avastab ennast metsast relvade keskelt koos mehega, kes võib iga hetk teada saada, et Aksel on teda kõige hullemal moel reetnud. Samal ajal läheneb ärimees Rihard Laurale ja naine on teelahkmel, kas minna uude suhtesse või on selleks veel vara? Samal ajal satub Laura aga oma kunagise peigmehe ahistamise küüsi ja vajab Rihardi abi. Laura ja Aksli poja internetiprojekt on aga ootamatult populaarseks saanud ja kogu maailm elab paari lahutusele kaasa. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissöör Ergo Kuld, tootja Kassikuld OÜ.

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu
programme.desc: Saatesari "Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu" teine hooaeg keskendub nüüdki päevakajalistele kultuuriteemadele. Lahkame probleeme ning otsime muredele lahendusi tuues teoreetikud ja praktikud kokku. Saatejuhid on Maarja Vaino, Tarmo Tiisler ja Kaupo Meiel. Režissöör Andres Lepasar.

programme.title: Muinasjutt kalurist ja tema naisest
Vom Fischer und seiner Frau
programme.desc: Muinasjutt kalurist, kes elab koos naisega vanas osmikus mere kaldal. Ühel päeval püüab ta kala, kes on tegelikult võlutud prints. Kala palub härdalt oma elu eest ja mees laseb ta vabaks. Kui naine sellest kuuleb, hakkab ta mehe kallal tänitama, et ta kalalt midagi vastu ei küsinud ja sunnib meest tagasi mere äärde minema. Kala täidab naise ühe soovi teise järel, kuid naisel ei saa kuidagi küll.

programme.title: Ninjakunstnik
programme.desc: Täna korraldab Ricky suurim fänn tema auks näituse, sest käes on fännipäev!

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Seekord tõttavad Džungliässad appi jaanimardikatele, keda ähvardavad kurjad kameeleonid.

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
Do-Re-Mi
programme.sub-title: Birgit Õigemeel ja Laulukarussell 2010 finalistid. Do-Re-Mi

programme.title: Kohtume Pariisis
programme.desc: Lena ei suuda kogu uut infot vastu võtta ja pühendub täielikult tantsule. Blokk saab kutse suurele rahvusvahelisele võistlusele, aga aastalõpuetenduse lähenedes jääb võistlusel osalemine küsimärgi alla.

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Oktonaudid leiavad soost jõevähid, keda vaevab kummaline haigus: nad on täppe täis ja sügelevad! Selgub, et üks kummaline tegelane on käinud neid nakatamas. Oktonaudid peavad leidma vähkidele õige ravi, aga ka süüdlase üles otsima.

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Martinile teeb haiget, et kõik naeravad ta pere üle, kuid ta vanemaid ei kurvasta see üldse. Martin otsustab testi ära teha ja ka suvekooli minna.

programme.title: Indiaanipoiss Yakari
programme.desc: Hõim ootab, kelle Kindel Kalju määrab teejuhiks talvisele rännakule. Selleks tuleb leida peidetud püha tomahook.

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Alfred koos sõpradega saab teada, et metsas on puhkenud kullapalavik. Kuid on see ikka ehtne kuld, mis kõigis nii suurt elevust tekitab?

programme.title: Rebased ja mägrad
programme.desc: Marti tahab Skautmäkra enda poole ööbima kutsuda, kuid peab küsima luba Edmundilt, kes paraku on väga kehvas tujus….

programme.title: Lunnisaar
programme.desc: Lunnipere läheb öisele seiklusele, et aidata koju üks eksinud konnake.

programme.title: Muumioru lood
programme.desc: Muumitroll astub vastu oma seni raskeimale katsumusele, kui ta talveunest liiga vara üles ärkab ja leiab end üksinda Muumioru talve võõras maailmas. Kuid kohtumine oma iidse sugulase, Esivanemaga, õpetab talle, kuidas ellujäämiseks oma ürgset poolt kasutada.

programme.title: Mängime arsti
programme.desc: "Mängime arsti!" on vahva ja hariv minisari 6-9-aastastele lastele, milles selgitatakse lihtsal ja näitlikul viisil enamlevinud haiguste olemust ning sümptomite avaldumisvorme.

programme.title: Jää valitseja
Ledus Pavelnieks
programme.desc: Kui lossi saabub jää valitseja, peab kuningas teda eksikombel naljameheks ja naerab tema üle kogu südamest. Karistus ei jää aga tulemata ja olukorrale peavad lahenduse leidma pere kõige nooremad.

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Karumõmmi unelaul. Eesti Raadio Laulustuudio lastekoor

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia ja Saara jäävad matkates äikesetormi kätte ning otsivad varju mahajäetud metsaonnist, kus Miia õpetab taas Saarale võluraamatu ruune. Tsentoopias on Ööväät taas uusi maid vallutanud ja haldjad teevad kõik, et seda peatada. Seekord saavad nad abi hoopiski Tumedast Lossist.

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool
programme.desc: "PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool" aitab orienteeruda Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali rikkalikus ja mitmetahulises kavas. Intervjuud režissööride ja asjaosalistega heidavad lisaks festivalile ka laiema kõrvalpilgu filmimaastikul toimuvale, oma sõna ütlevad sekka ka filmispetsialistid ning -kriitikud. Toimetajad Kaspar Viilup ja Kaisa Potisepp, režissöör Jan Jonatan Karits, produtsent Age Kraus.

programme.title: Ameerika comandante
American Comandante
programme.desc: William Morgan hukati Havannas 11. märtsil 1961. aastal ja seejärel tahtnuks Kuuba kommunistlik liider Fidel Castro, et lugu Ameerika comandantest rahva seas kiiresti ununeks. Aga ometi on veel elus mehe lähedased ja kaasvõitlejad, kes meenutavad ühte uskumatut seiklust ühel ajaloo pöördelisemal perioodil.

programme.title: Koomikud ja küsimused
programme.desc: Kõige lõbusam küsimustesaade teleekraanil! Punkte jagatakse nii õige vastuse kui ka humoorika mõttekäigu eest. Võistkondade kaptenid on stand-up koomikud Sander Õigus ja Mikael Meema, saadet hoiavad kursil Kaspar Kikerpill ning Karl-Alari Varma. Igas saates on ka kaks külalist, kes annavad oma panuse punktide kogumisse. Selles saates hoiavad koomikutega koos takti Reigo Ahven ja Robert Linna.

programme.title: Suur unelm
Der ganz grosse Traum
programme.desc: 1874. aastal läks Konrad Koch Saksamaale inglise keelt õpetama ning pidi leidma uue viisi, kuidas tekitada õpilastes huvi ja soovi õppida tundma võõrast keelt ning kultuuri. Tõsielul põhinev film räägib läbi draama ja huumoriprisma noorest inglise keele õpetajast Konrad Kochist, kes ei muutnud mitte ainult oma õpilaste elu, vaid tõi Saksamaale ka jalgpalli.

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool
programme.desc: "PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool" aitab orienteeruda Pimedate Ööde filmifestivali rikkalikus ja mitmetahulises kavas. Intervjuud režissööride ja asjaosalistega heidavad lisaks festivalile ka laiema kõrvalpilgu filmimaastikul toimuvale, oma sõna ütlevad sekka ka filmispetsialistid ning -kriitikud. Toimetajad Kaspar Viilup ja Kaisa Potisepp, režissöör Jan Jonatan Karits, produtsent Age Kraus.(n)

programme.title: Lubadus koidikul
La promesse de l'aube
programme.desc: R: Eric Barbier. Tuntud Prantsuse romaanikirjaniku, kahekordselt Councourt´i auhinnaga pärjatud Romain Gary samanimelisel teosel põhinev autobiograafiline, kohati tragikoomilistes toonides draama. Vilniuses sündinud Gary nooruspõlv oli kirev - keeruline lapsepõlv möödus Poolas, teismeiga aga päikeselises Nice’is, Teine maailmasõda tõi kaasa lenduriameti… Kirjanikuks kujunemise ja küpsemise juures oli pojale (Pierre Niney) alati toeks ekstsentriline ning vankumatu ema Nina (Charlotte Gainsbourg). Neli Prantsuse filmiauhinna César nominatsiooni.(n)

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Kaunis hommik hakkab ootamatult hämarduma ja Susapusa tõttab Okidosse põhjust uurima. Lapsed kuulevad, et kohe on algamas päikesevarjutus ehk eklips ja kõik valmistuvad seda jälgima. Paraku läheb midagi valesti ja Päike ei tulegi Okidosse tagasi. Lapsed koos Susapusaga lendavad Kuule, et uurida selle põhjust. Seal kohtavad nad tulnukaid, kelle planeedil on omakorda suur probleem.(n)

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Susapusa laseb vaibal liugu ja kõik ta karvad tõusevad turri. Lisaks saab ta veel särtsu. Pimm ja Pamm seletavad, mis seda põhjustab ning lapsed saavad teada, mis on aatom, elektronid ja prootonid ning kuidas need omavahel toimivad.(n)

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: On reede, terve nädalavahetus on ees ja ema-isa viivad kaksikud seiklema. Korraliku seikluse juurde käib alati ka telkimine, aga kahjuks ei lähe seekord kõik nii, nagu oleks võinud.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia ja Saara jäävad matkates äikesetormi kätte ning otsivad varju mahajäetud metsaonnist, kus Miia õpetab taas Saarale võluraamatu ruune. Tsentoopias on Ööväät taas uusi maid vallutanud ja haldjad teevad kõik, et seda peatada. Seekord saavad nad abi hoopiski Tumedast Lossist.(n)

programme.title: Indiaanipoiss Yakari
programme.desc: Yakari läheb Tossutajale metsast ravimtaimi tooma, kuid avastab teel, et kõik loomad käituvad kuidagi veidralt.(n)

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Täna võistlevad Mikk-Mikk ja Kübarapoiss omavahel, kumb tohib olla Tähekübara abiline.(n)

programme.title: Entel-tenteli laululood
programme.desc: Entel-tentel-trika-trei - laululapsed kõik me head, kes meist laule rohkem teab? ETV legendaarsest lauluvõistlusest on möödas küll üle poole sajandi, kuid samad laulud on ikka laste suul. Eesti lastelaulu klassikasse kuuluvad palad said uue hääle Eesti Raadio Laste Laulustuudiolt Kadri Hundi ja Kaie Tanneri juhendamisel. Helirežii Teet Kehlmann, režissöör Toorion Ojaperv, operaator Meelis Mikker, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Piip ja Tuut. Köögiviljateater. Herned ja oad

programme.title: Kurat kolme kuldse juuksekarvaga
Der Teufel mit den drei goldenen Haaren
programme.desc: Vendade Grimmide muinasjutu ainetel vändatud lastefilmi peategelaseks on õnnesärgis sündinud poiss, kellele ennustati, et ta võib abielluda kuninga enda tütrega. Kui kuningas seda kuulis, otsustas ta poisist lahti saada. Ta lubas poisi vanematele, et kasvatab õnnelapse lossis üles, kuid lasi ta hoopis hälliga allavoolu. Õnneks ei kukkunud lapsuke kosest alla, vaid sattus sepa peresse. Kui kuninga ja õnnelapse teed nüüd teist korda ristusid ning kuningas taipas, et poiss ei uppunudki koses, otsustab ta jälle lasta poisi hukata. Õnnetäht aga kaitseb Felixit seegi kord ja nii ei jää kuningal muud üle, kui saata ta kuradi enda juurde.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Alfred koos sõpradega saab teada, et metsas on puhkenud kullapalavik. Kuid on see ikka ehtne kuld, mis kõigis nii suurt elevust tekitab?(n)

programme.title: Magus molekul
programme.desc: Kolmanda hooaja esimeses episoodis on superstaariks rukis, mis on eestlaste toidulaual juba väga ammu olulise koha hõivanud. Merle ja Aigar valmistavad rukkijahust lapsepõlve-maitselist magusrooga ning teaduslaboris loovad Freya ja Aigar rukkijahuga kohevat kunsti.(n)

programme.title: Kohtume Pariisis
programme.desc: Aastalõpuetendus on lähenemas ja õpetajad valmistuvad rollide jagamiseks. Thea ei suuda peast visata kinnisideed, et Lena midagi varjab, ja ta läheb Lenat teeseldes Oscari poodi.(n)

programme.title: Meteoroloogia eesliinil
The Weather: The Race to Forecast
programme.desc: Meteoroloogia on teinud viimastel kümnenditel hiigeledusamme ning et ilmaennustused oleksid täpsed, saadetakse üles uusi satelliite, täiustatakse arvutimudeleid ja tehakse üha rohkem mõõtmisi. Ilmaennustus on igapäevaelu kindel osa, ent kuidas see sünnib, on üldiselt teadmata. Film uurib, kuidas teadlased oma prognoose igal aastal täiustavad ja aitavad katastroofe vältida.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Martini arstikarjäär jääb järelevalve alla. Meditsiininõukogu tuleb Martini tööd hindama. Al teeb Morwennale kogemata abieluettepaneku. Mel püüab James Ellinghami kohta üht-teist välja uurida.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Meditsiininõukogu hinnang kohustab Martinit käima kolmel täienduskursusel, alustades flebotoomiast. Louisa keskendub uuele ametile laste ja noorukite nõustajana. Berti pahameeleks palkab Al Caitlini ja tunnistab üles, et tegi abieluettepaneku kogemata.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Louisa tahaks korraldada Martinile sünnipäevapeo, aga samal ajal teeb Al Morwennale üllatuskihluspeo. Louise tund lõpeb ehmatusega. Penhale on pettunud, kui Ruthi murdvargus polegi selline, nagu näis.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Martin peab tegema demonstratsioonoperatsiooni, aga Buddy on kadunud. Keni tulek on Alile ja Bertile halb uudis. Penhale on masendunud, kuna tema eelkäija Mark Mylow tuleb tagasi ja püüab juurdlust üle võtta.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Inimest tulistati ja Penhale peab süüdlase välja selgitama. Louisa tunneb end pigem Martini patsiendi kui abikaasana ja teeb ettepaneku minna viljakusspetsialisti juurde. Jamesile saab osaks krahh ja pubi pannakse müüki.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli Balti turniir
programme.desc: Eesti jalgpallikoondise teine mäng Balti turniiril selgitab koondise seekordse turniiri lõppkoha. Ülekannet kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Joel-Rasmus Remmel.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Martinile teeb haiget, et kõik naeravad ta pere üle, kuid ta vanemaid ei kurvasta see üldse. Martin otsustab testi ära teha ja ka suvekooli minna.(n)

programme.title: Kunksmoor
programme.desc: Keset tuulist merd on pisike saar, kus kasvavad kõverad ja haralised männid. Randa kivide vahele teevad merelinnud oma pesa. Kunksmoor, kes elab samuti saarel, keedab seal punasest vasest katla sees nõiarohtusid. Nõiarohtude ja -kunstidega oskab ta ravida igasuguseid haigusi ning tõbesid. Film valmis Aino Perviku lasteraamatu ainetel. Režissöör Heino Pars.(n)

programme.title: Laulukarusselli kuldne kolmik
programme.desc: Pool aastat pärast Laulukarussell 2015 finaalkontserti käisime Viljandimaal ja Tallinnas, et veelkord kohtuda lauluvõistluse kolme võitjaga. Teie ees on Triinu Johanna Sepp, Vaiko Aasaküla ja Märten Männiste koos pere ning sõpradega. Režissöör Toorion Ojaperv, produtsent Kadi Priske.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Saara teatab, et tahab samuti Tsentoopias ära käia. Miia annab talle käevõru, see aga hakkab ootamatult plinkima ja tüdrukute vahel läheb rüseluseks, mille käigus murdub kivi küljest tükike. Miia jõuab siiski Tsentoopiasse ja lendab koos sõpradega Kristallkoopasse järgmist südamekristalli otsima.(n)

programme.title: Uudishimu tippkeskus
programme.desc: Vanasti oli see karistus, kui last õue mängima ei lastud, aga nüüd näevad vanemad kurja vaeva, et oma võsukesi ekraani tagant hoovi peale saada. Virtuaalne on üha enam reaalne. Millal me enam aru ei saa kumb on kumb? Saatejuht-peatoimetaja Maarja Merivoo-Parro, toimetaja Airika Harrik, režissöör Andres Lepasar, tegevprodutsent Carmen-Louise Suuroja.(n)

programme.title: OP
programme.desc: Iganädalane kultuurikompass! Saatejuht Owe Petersell ja reporter Ave Häkli võtavad vaataja kaasa kinno, teatrisse, näitusele, raamatupoodi, kontserdile ja mujalegi. Režissöör Antti Häkli, toimetaja Ave Marleen Rei.(n)

programme.title: Koomikud ja küsimused
programme.desc: Kõige lõbusam küsimustesaade teleekraanil! Punkte jagatakse nii õige vastuse kui ka humoorika mõttekäigu eest. Võistkondade kaptenid on stand-up koomikud Sander Õigus ja Mikael Meema, saadet hoiavad kursil Kaspar Kikerpill ning Karl-Alari Varma. Igas saates on ka kaks külalist, kes annavad oma panuse punktide kogumisse. Ekraanil võtavad osalistega mõõtu külalised Genka ja Arop.(n)

programme.title: Whitney. Luba olla mina ise
Renée Fleming's Cities That Sing - Paris
programme.desc: Whitney Houston oli superstaari võrdkuju, "Ameerika printsess", kõigi aegade auhinnatuim naisartist. Ehkki Whitney teenis miljoneid dollareid, oli edetabelite tipus sagedamini kui biitlid ja ta oli arvatud kõigi aegade parimate lauljate hulka, ei leidnud ta siiski vabadust olla tema ise ning ta suri vaid 48-aastasena. Seni avaldamata videokaadrite ja eksklusiivsete kontsertsalvestustega rikastatud film jutustab Whitney Houstoni uskumatust ja hingekriipivast elust talle kõige lähemate inimeste suu läbi. R: Nick Broomfield.(n)

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Two couples go to a couples’ resort for a romantic retreat. There, they relive their honeymoons and reinvigorate their marriages, however, they also encounter a series of comic predicaments at the same time.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: A group of robbers attempt to steal $20 million while a police officer gets in the way and events follow.

programme.title: Colombiana
programme.desc: In 1992 Bogota, a small girl Cataleya, witnesses the murder of her parents by one of the terrorists' bands. Her uncle Emilio, helps her to recover and teaches her to take revenge from her parents killers. After getting prepared and trained on different sorts of weapons Cataleya starts planning for payback.

programme.title: Facing Ali
programme.desc: A documentary on Muhammad Ali, the American professional boxer, in which ten of his former opponents, including George Chuvalo and Ron Lyle, pay tribute to him.

programme.title: A Case of You
programme.desc: Sam Newman, a writer, fails to get the girl of his dreams. He claims to be an athletic, courageous and charismatic person on social media to change his luck and succeeds in his plan and attracts his dream girl Birdie. Sam pretended to be someone else whenever around Birdie and eventually had to tell her the truth before it was too late.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: After a global blackout, a struggling musician shockingly discovers that he’s the only person on earth who remembers the world renowned music band, The Beatles.

programme.title: La La Land
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Mia, an ambitious actress, who serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as their success rises they are faced with decisions that begin to affect the fragile fabric of their love relationship, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other are started to threaten to rip them apart.

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: When his self-destructive behavior leaves his career circling the drain, a chef looks for a fresh start in trying to assemble a team of top-notch chefs in order to achieve his dream of starting a restaurant worthy of three Michelin stars.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother's suicide, Tyler's family splinters off under the pressure of their trauma. When he meets Ally, they find solace for their individual familial troubles in each other's arms. Love is born amid tragedy as both Ally and Tyler change each other's lives.(n)

programme.title: Nine Lives
programme.desc: When a mysterious event leaves him in the body of the cat he got for his daughter's birthday, a workaholic businessman is forced to reexamine his familial relationships and confront his negligence of his family, all while trying to figure out a way to return to his body and regain his life.(n)

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams family finds their home in danger when a reality TV star labels their eerie mansion as a threat to the picture-perfect community she is trying to build. As she employs every mean to get rid of them, the Addams family must fight to save their home.(n)

programme.title: Nerve
programme.desc: The film revolves around a high school senior, who becomes completely immersed in an online game of Truth or Dare, where her every move is manipulated by an anonymous community of "watchers.".(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, the multinational OmniCorp is at the center of robot and weapon technology. When Alex Murphy, a loving father and a good cop is seriously injured, OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer. But Alex's life begins to change and turns upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.(n)

programme.title: Along Came Polly
programme.desc: After he discovers his wife's unfaithfulness during their honeymoon, Reuben returns to the city to keep up with highly organized life, only to fall for an old friend who turns his life upside down.(n)

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.(n)

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham is a man with a very odd job. He travels to offices across the United States in order to execute layoffs. His job has him travelling most of the time and he has found a comfortable life for himself. However, Natalie Keener, a rapidly-rising young co-worker at Ryan’s head office, threatens to throw his world off balance by proposing that firing should be done through the internet.(n)

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: Based on his own book, this is the true story of Jordan Belfort. A stock-broker who had it all after his rise to the high life of a millionaire and lost it all after his fall involving crime and the federal government.(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: The film follows a family whose suburban home is invaded by angry spirits. When the terrifying apparitions escalate their attacks and take the youngest daughter, the family must come together to rescue her.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: The bride, Uma Thurman, returns to complete her vengeance against her former boss, Bill, and his gang who deprived her of her baby. The bride wants to kill all the members of the team, which she was a part of, as well as Bill (David Carradine) who was once her lover.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible- Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and his team embark on their most impossible mission yet: putting an end to the “Syndicate”; an international grime organization aiming to destroy the IMF.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Paul Conroy is US truck driver who works as a contractor in Iraq. He finds himself buried alive in a wooden coffin, with a cellphone that proved to be useless , he's forced to rely on himself to survive.

programme.title: War
programme.desc: After his partner is killed by the elusive assassin Rogue, FBI agent John Crawford swears revenge on the infamous assassin who set off a crime war between two Asian gangs.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Jonas comes to discover the horrifying truth of his seemingly ideal community when he is assigned to learn from the keeper of the memories from before their heavily-controlled world was constructed. When the stakes turn personal, Jonas is forced to try to break out of his world to save everyone.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Being the first human being born on Mars, Gardner Elliot reads a lot about Earth, his mother's planet. After 16 years, he is eager to visit Earth to get to experience its wonders himself, hoping to learn how he came into being. Meanwhile, he strikes an online friendship with a girl on Earth.

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: Seventy years after a horrific war with aliens, an exceptionally gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for the future invasion.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: When an A.T.F agent is assigned to investigate a terrorist attack, he makes use of a special new technology that enables him to see four days in the past. But can a glimpse into the past help him to stop the perpetrator's next attack in the present.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Jill was kidnapped two years ago, and is haunted by the incident even after she was rescued. When she gets home one day to find her little sister gone, she is convinced that she's kidnapped by the same person who abducted her two years before. When she goes to the police she is met with disbelief, and decides to take matters in her own hands to save her sister.

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: When a blind wife regains her sight, she finds out how bad her relationship with her husband is.

programme.title: Adrift
programme.desc: The true story of, Tami Oldham and Richard Sharp, who sailed across the ocean, but didn't anticipate that they would be sailing directly into one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history and must stand against all difficulties throughout their journey.

programme.title: The Grey
programme.desc: In the North Pole within dramatic events, an oil drilling team faces harsh conditions and predatory wolves after their plane crash.

programme.desc: Once again, John McClane stumbles into trouble when the airport where he is waiting for his wife is taken hostage by a group of terrorists in an attempt to secure the release of a drug lord.(n)

programme.desc: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, Martin Terrier (Sean Penn) retires to settle down with his girlfriend, but the organization he works for has other plans for him. Forced to return to Congo, where he had a successful assassination, he finds himself chased by his own his team.(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: The reporter Gary Webb's life becomes threatened , when he uncovers a CIA inside plot that involves arming Contra rebels in Nicaragua and trafficking cocaine into California.(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-Special Forces soldier Joey returns to London from a tour in Afghanistan, a homeless, damaged veteran. Sucked into the city's criminal underworld, he assumes another man's identity and seeking redemption,he helps the poor and kills those who spread corruption.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where crime rates have become insanely high, evil corporation Omni Consumer Products tries to create a prototype that is half-robot and half-human. When RoboCop learns about their intrigues, he turns on his masters.

programme.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage returns after self-imposed exile leaving an impression that he was long dead. He secretly works with his handler, Augustus Gibbons, and his team to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's box.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael is an engineer, who has his memory erased after completing each job. When the wealthy James Rithrick offers him a multiple-year contract, with the same conditions, he realizes that erasing his memory has erased crucial details of the work assignment.

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: The British Intelligence recruits archaeologist Lara Croft on a mission to get to Pandora's box, which has the most dangerous disease known to mankind. Evil scientist Jonathan has his sights set on the box as well, and Lara Croft agrees to face him on the condition that the Intelligence release the man she is in a relationship with.

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.

programme.title: Captive State
programme.desc: With Chicago falling under alien rule for a decade, the human residents chafe at the impoverished neighborhoods they have to live in as an underground resistance group plots to attack.

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: Will decides to travel to Spain to meet his family for a vacation, but discovers that all his family has been kidnapped. On his quest to find them, facts start to appear, and Will discovers that his father works for an international spying organization.

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: After becoming an outcast following the aftermath of Harvey Dent's death, Bruce Wayne's resumes his role as the caped crusader who must defend Gotham City from Bane's plan of nuclear destruction.

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When an American facility in the Middle East is bombarded, a group of U.S. government agents is asked to investigate the incident and find the culprits in a snowballing battle.

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.

programme.title: Robocop 2
programme.desc: The Detroit Police are being attacked, while the conglomerate that runs the police (OCP) is developing a new robot to replace Robocop. Meanwhile, a group of criminals led by Cane are discovering a new drug. It becomes imperative for RoboCop and his partner Anne to fight back.

programme.desc: Following a successful police crackdown on Gotham's criminal population, an unhinged new criminal appears to challenge both Batman and DA Harvey Dent's campaigns. Chaos and death follow in the Joker's walk as he makes the fight more personal than expected.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.

programme.title: The Dogs of War
programme.desc: Jamie Shannon is hired by a British businessman along with other mercenaries to rob the people of Zangaro of their fortunes. However, their intentions change when they arrive there.

programme.title: Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: Susan Cooper is a desk-bound CIA analyst, and the unsung hero behind the Agency's most dangerous missions. But when her partner falls off the grid and another top agent is compromised, she volunteers to go deep undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent a global crisis.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Today, Kaulder is the last witch hunter remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film director's plans to shoot his upcoming war movie in the jungle quickly go south when the film crew faces a series of complications, from land mines to local drug lords.

programme.title: Robocop 3
programme.desc: A greedy corporation is determined to eradicate the city of Detroit and begin its developmental project, Delta City. They employ armed forces to frighten the citizens, and RoboCop joins the civilian resistance to side with the citizens and save them.

But when her partner falls off the grid and another top agent is compromised, she volunteers to go deep undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent a global crisis.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.(n)

programme.title: The Dogs of War
programme.desc: Jamie Shannon is hired by a British businessman along with other mercenaries to rob the people of Zangaro of their fortunes. However, their intentions change when they arrive there.(n)

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: DragonHeart
programme.desc: After inadvertently granting King Einon immortality when he gives him a piece of his heart to heal him, the dragon Draco joins forces with Einon's former mentor, the knight Bowen, as they seek to put an end to Einon's reign of terror as the tyrant king rules his kingdom with fire and blood.(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: When an A.T.F agent is assigned to investigate a terrorist attack, he makes use of a special new technology that enables him to see four days in the past. But can a glimpse into the past help him to stop the perpetrator's next attack in the present.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: Now in his twenties, John Connor is being hunted by a new female terminator, the T-X. A CSM-101 terminator is sent back in time to protect him just as the machines start to take over the world.(n)

programme.title: Terminator: Genisys
programme.desc: When John Connor, Human Resistance leader, launches a final attack on Skynet (a global artificial intelligence operating system called "Genisys" leading a machines' rise against mankind), Skynet sends a T-800 Terminator to 1987 to kill Sarah, John's mother. Kyle, John's right-hand man, follows the T-800 and Sarah re-programmes it into "Pops" to form a team in a deadly adventure to destroy Genisys.(n)

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
programme.desc: 65 years after a masked murderer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, new murders start happening, Is it a copycat or something more evil? A mysterious high school girl might be the only key to catching the murderer.(n)

programme.title: DragonHeart
programme.desc: After inadvertently granting King Einon immortality when he gives him a piece of his heart to heal him, the dragon Draco joins forces with Einon's former mentor, the knight Bowen, as they seek to put an end to Einon's reign of terror as the tyrant king rules his kingdom with fire and blood.(n)

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: The movie chronicles around a survival story that goes 20 thousand years back, during the last Ice Age.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Proud Mary
programme.desc: An assassin’s life changes upon meeting a young boy who ignites her motherhood instincts.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Hoping to turn his life around, the 70-year-old Ben Whittaker realizes that retirement should never be a phase of waiting for death. As he takes a job as an intern in a fashion house, he strikes an unlikely friendship with Jules, becoming her assistant, a fatherly figure, and a trustworthy friend.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Something Borrowed
programme.desc: Rachel and Darcy have been friends since childhood, despite the differences in their characters. However, they fall for the same man, Dex, who is engaged to Darcy, and towards whom Rachel has secret feelings. A difficult test of love and friendship ensues.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: Between Poland, Berlin, Yugoslavia, and Paris, a budding romance brings together two people of almost opposing natures and temperaments, a music director and a singer. But the backdrop of the Cold War complicates things as the director tries to persuade the singer to flee Poland.

programme.title: Keep Watching
programme.desc: When a group of intruders have a family imprisoned in their home and forced to play a game of life and death, the peculiar rules of the game become clearer as the night approaches, and the family learns that while they're living their worst nightmare, the whole world is streaming and watching.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: After the Wall Street broker Will and his son Danny witness the murder of a crooked police officer following a botched bank robbery, Will is forced to help the criminals recover the stolen money after they kidnap Danny.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: After a sour breakup, Clementine and Joel undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memory, but while their minds are being swept clean from their shared past, Joel tries to hold onto one last memory to be their safe haven, hoping for the prospect of a new, future encounter.

programme.title: Unleashing Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: A modern-day Pride and Prejudice that sees Elizabeth Scott clashing with Donovan Darcy at a dog show after his attitude rubs her the wrong way. Despite sharing a mutual attraction, their relationship goes downhill as a series of misunderstandings ensue, until they get a real look at each other.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: A story about family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on the early days of oil exploration in the early twentieth century through Daniel Plainview, a businessman who takes a great opportunity that will change his life.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.

programme.title: The Sisters Brothers
programme.desc: Gold prospector Hermann Kermit Warm, is being chased from Oregon desert to San Francisco by the infamous assassins Eli and Charlie Sisters. But Eli is starting to have second thoughts about his life of crime.

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: Brian and Carrie are a journalist duo who go on a cross-country ride to research serial killer murder sites. They share the ride with Early Grayce and his girlfriend, and they later discover that Grayce is a deranged killer himself.

programme.title: Savages
programme.desc: Drug growers Ben and Chon take on a vicious Mexican drug cartel when they kidnap their shared girlfriend (Blake Lively).

programme.title: Little Man Tate
programme.desc: Fred is a genius in math and reading, but he can't adjust with other children in school, he's slowly isolated from them and finds it difficult to socialize next to those of his age, he gets help from his teacher and his single mom.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.(n)

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: When Jessica King mysteriously disappears, the clairvoyant fortune-teller Annie Wilson begins to see visions of her that will lead her to shocking discoveries.(n)

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: New York City business student Brian Flanagan gets a part-time job as a bartender to support himself. He ends up in Jamaica where he plans to have his own bar, while he falls for the waitress Jordan.(n)

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Adapted from Nikolai Leskov's Lady Macbeth of the Mtsensk District, the movie depicts the life of a young woman stifled by her marriage of convenience to a man twice her age. Confined and left behind by her husband, she starts a romance with a young man from the estate.(n)

programme.title: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: When a case turns personal for a defense attorney, he has to do everything in his power to save the only son of his widowed friend, Mike, who is accused of killing his rich father. But the trial reveals a lot of dark and hidden secrets about the victim, his wife, and their familial relationships.(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: When Jessica King mysteriously disappears, the clairvoyant fortune-teller Annie Wilson begins to see visions of her that will lead her to shocking discoveries.(n)

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: After his divorce, a crushed Alan, along with his ten-year old son Jake, moves in with his free-spirited, jingle writer, bachelor brother Charlie, only to disrupt his wild, carefree life.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S2
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. They're also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.

programme.title: Dear Evan Hansen
programme.desc: As the high school senior Evan Hansen suffers from social anxiety, a tragic event sends him on a journey of self-discovery and acceptance.

programme.title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Bodyguard Michael Bryce finds himself embroiled in a new dangerous mission, as he teams up with hitman Darius Kincaid and his wife Sonia in order to thwart a cyberattack in Europe.

programme.title: Nobody
programme.desc: After an incident in which he failed to protect his family, Hutch is unable to deal with the distance it results in, which only fuels his determination to protect a woman when she gets harassed. But as the confrontation earns him the wrath of a drug lord, he fights to protect himself and his family.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: Alice's solitary life is interrupted when a London evacuee named Frank is left in her care. Yearning to get back to her peaceful existence, Alice plans to wash her hands off the whole thing the first chance she gets, but she ends up forming a deep connection with him.

programme.title: Sol
programme.desc: The plot revolves around Sol, a well-known Argentine tango performer in Buenos Aires who does everything she can to keep her estranged relationship with her only son, Raphaël, a secret.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Colors of Love
programme.desc: As Taylor Harris, a librarian who unexpectedly loses her job travels to her brother's tiny hamlet in Montana, she becomes embroiled in trying to stop businessman Joel Sheenan from renovating her brother's small-town hotel.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: As a family decides to spend their vacation on a tropical island, they find themselves facing a terrifying nightmare as the island contains a mysterious power that makes people grow old every half hour.

programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: Alice's solitary life is interrupted when a London evacuee named Frank is left in her care. Yearning to get back to her peaceful existence, Alice plans to wash her hands off the whole thing the first chance she gets, but she ends up forming a deep connection with him.

programme.title: Leila's Brothers
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Leila discovers that she has spent her entire life caring for her family members who have been incurring debts, but as she finds her siblings struggling to make money, Leila comes up with a plan to work things out.

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: The film follows the story of three characters, a drug dealer, an architect and a university professor, who are brought together on a journey that is connected with a drug company that is producing a painkiller that is non-addictive.

programme.title: Halloween Kills
programme.desc: After escaping death at the hands of serial killer Michael Myers, Laurie Strode decides to join a group of survivors in an effort to hunt down Michael and get rid of him in the hopes of putting a halt to this endless gore.

programme.title: Colors of Love

programme.desc: The film follows the story of three characters, a drug dealer, an architect and a university professor, who are brought together on a journey that is connected with a drug company that is producing a painkiller that is non-addictive.

programme.desc: Alice's solitary life is interrupted when a London evacuee named Frank is left in her care. Yearning to get back to her peaceful existence, Alice plans to wash her hands off the whole thing the first chance she gets, but she ends up forming a deep connection with him.

programme.title: Leila's Brothers
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Leila discovers that she has spent her entire life caring for her family members who have been incurring debts, but as she finds her siblings struggling to make money, Leila comes up with a plan to work things out.

programme.title: Colors of Love
programme.desc: As Taylor Harris, a librarian who unexpectedly loses her job travels to her brother's tiny hamlet in Montana, she becomes embroiled in trying to stop businessman Joel Sheenan from renovating her brother's small-town hotel.

programme.title: Old
programme.desc: As a family decides to spend their vacation on a tropical island, they find themselves facing a terrifying nightmare as the island contains a mysterious power that makes people grow old every half hour.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: A look into the origins of Snake Eyes and how he made it to being a G.I.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: After a confrontation on the road, a single mother and her son find themselves stalked by a deranged man who's hellbent on teaching them fatal lessons.

programme.title: Candyman

programme.title: Deep Water
programme.desc: An unlikely marriage story that stars a husband who is so unwilling to divorce his wife, so he allows her to have affairs instead, only for him to become a prime suspect when his wife's lovers disappear one after another.

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: When his son gets kidnapped by a mysterious entity, former special forces agent Niro finds himself embroiled in a dangerous situation, as he must take out three dangerous crime syndicates in order to get his son back.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Danny has been enslaved his whole life without receiving proper education, so he has the mind and personality of a little child. He is a skilled fighter, and his owner, Bart, treats him like a guard dog, complete with a collar. When an accident leaves Bart in a coma, Danny meets a blind man who helps him change his point of view about life.

programme.title: BOO!
programme.desc: One torn family refuses to respond to a warning from an innocent prank ,which causes evil forces to awaken.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: The true story of a Nebraska cop who takes a job as a peacekeeper for the UN in post-war Bosnia and Herzegovina. What she thinks is a mission to help the war-torn country ends up revealing the corruption within the UN as she uncovers a human-trafficking ring that is being deliberately ignored.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: In a mythical world, the personal revenge of the barbarian warrior Conan turns into an epic battle against all of his adversaries and enormous monsters, at the heart of impossible odds, becoming the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria from the domination of supernatural evil forces.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: An improvised rancher joins the escort that will bring outlaw Ben Wade to Contention City in preparation for his transfer to the Yuma Territorial Prison. The simple journey gets complicated by the pursuit of Wade's gang, an attack by the Apaches and a prisoner well-versed in escaping the law.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: Between Worlds
programme.desc: The trucker Joe finds himself facing an unusual situation after he is recruited to help a spiritually-gifted mother save her comatose daughter, Billie. But Billie is possessed by the spirit of Joe's late wife, who is not about to relinquish her hold on Billie as she still has business to attend to.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: In a game of mind and control in the future, death row convicts are forced to participate in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage player, has to survive 30 sessions in order to be free.

programme.title: Once Fallen
programme.desc: After serving half a decade in prison, an ex-convict decides to turn over a new leaf and start anew, but life has other plans for him as he is forced back into the underworld of crime.

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is obsessed with martial arts and kung-fu movies. One day he discovers an ancient stick that used to belong to the Monkey King, and when he holds it, he is transported back to ancient China.

programme.desc: When novelist Monty Wildhorn loses the motivation to write, his nephew persuades him to spend the summer in quiet Belle Isle. He befriends a single mother and her three girls and they give him the inspiration he needs to write again.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember
programme.desc: When the reckless teenager Landon Carter gets into trouble, he's forced to participate in a school play as part of his community service activities. He meets the reverend's daughter Jamie Sullivan, and they develop a bond that changes their lives forever.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends, Cristina and Vicky, one more rooted in sensuality and the other in logic and routine, travel to Barcelona and meet the charming painter Juan Antonio who becomes involved with both of them. Also in the mix is his passionate and unstable ex-wife, Maria.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Faded professional wrestler Randy 'The Ram' Robinson struggles to adjust to life outside the wrestling ring, as he juggles with keeping a small time job, mending his relationship with his estranged daughter and bonding with a stripper.

programme.title: Bordertown
programme.desc: An ambitious reporter is sent to a Mexican bordertown by her editor to investigate a series of brutal murders that target young factory women.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Once a school athlete, Chris tries to turn over a new leaf as he gets a job as a janitor at a bank. As he attempts to turn his life around and enjoy a normal existence, things go awry when he finds himself accused of planning a grand heist.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: Young boy Pi Patel is left adrift in the ocean after a storm wrecks the ship carrying his family and their zoo animals from India to Canada. He finds himself alone with a zebra, , a hyena and a Bengal tiger and the journey to fight for survival begins.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Faded professional wrestler Randy 'The Ram' Robinson struggles to adjust to life outside the wrestling ring, as he juggles with keeping a small time job, mending his relationship with his estranged daughter and bonding with a stripper.

programme.title: The Magic of Belle Isle
programme.desc: When novelist Monty Wildhorn loses the motivation to write, his nephew persuades him to spend the summer in quiet Belle Isle. He befriends a single mother and her three girls and they give him the inspiration he needs to write again.

programme.desc: An acclaimed writer struggles with getting over his ex-wife, and raising his teenaged children, as they all try to grapple with the complicated thing called love.

programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.

programme.title: Rough Night
